member.name: P:System.SR.BaseType_Cannot_Be_Sealed
member.summary: The base type '{0}' cannot be sealed.

member.name: P:System.SR.BaseType_Must_Have_Default_Ctor
member.summary: The base type '{0}' must have a public parameterless constructor.

member.name: P:System.SR.InterfaceType_Must_Be_Interface
member.summary: The type '{0}' must be an interface, not a class.

member.name: P:System.SR.BaseType_Cannot_Be_Abstract
member.summary: The base type '{0}' cannot be abstract.

member.name: P:System.SR.PlatformNotSupported_ReflectionDispatchProxy
member.summary: This operation is not supported on .NET Standard as Reflection.Emit is not available.
